sentences.english: All you need is a shortcrust pastry, a well made egg custard, and a sprinkling of nutmeg.

sentences.english: Fry shelled fresh shrimps additionally to also have similar effect with spadger egg according to the report.

sentences.english: Egg carving handicraft and iron handicraft are the most important two types of product of the company.

sentences.english: Mutton and eggs are the major sacrifices offered to the God of Rivers.

sentences.english: Use hard-boiled eggs to make deviled eggs or egg salad sandwiches.

sentences.english: Put in the sugar, egg, butter and ammonia to mix thoroughly.

sentences.english: The cook and the grocer haggled over the price of eggs.

sentences.english: In another shallow bowl, whisk the eggs, buttermilk and hot pepper sauce.
